Reviews.Title: The Silver Surfer
Reviews.Author: sam
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone years ago when it wasn't even available in the U.S. I have gone through 3 iPhones and 2 Google phones and I have always used this phone as a back up. I have never had any trouble with this phone to this day. I wish all phones were made like this. It is seriously the best phone I have ever owned. The only problem is that I cannot access internet on it and it is now an outdated phone. I have they had a newer version of this which was reliable as this phone. I would buy it in a heartbeat!! LG do this again!!

Reviews.Title: LG Telephone
Reviews.Author: Paul M. Zachey
Reviews.Content: I received the telephone within one week.The phone was absolutely brand new and worked like a charm
